author: cara anna/ AP
title: Coronavirus Deaths in Africa Could Reach 300,000 and Overwhelm Health Systems, Says Report
description: (JOHANNESBURG) — Africa could see 300,000 deaths from the coronavirus this year even under the best-case scenario, according to a new report released Friday that cites modeling from Imperial College London. Under the worst-case scenario with no interventions …
content:
(JOHANNESBURG) — Africa could see 300,000 deaths from the coronavirus this year even under the best-case scenario, according to a new report released Friday that cites modeling from Imperial College London.
Under the worst-case scenario with no interventions… [+3615 chars]
